name: Remove Reblogs from Tumblr Dashboard
description: this extremely simple script hides all reblogs that appear on your dash.
additional_info:
Beware! This will almost certainly empty your dashboard, and you may have to scroll to the bottom of the page and wait for it to load for quite some time.

This does not prevent tumblr from notifying you of any new posts that are most likely reblogged, so that red number will certainly betray you.
